description:
The Bonce Maternity tank features luxuriously soft and sustainable fabrics with anti-odor technology for nonstop confidence.

  • Made from recycled polyester with a bit of spandex for stretch
  • Moisture wicking lightweight fabric keeps you cool and dry with an ultra-soft feel
  • Polygiene® antibacterial finish reduces odor
name: MPG Bounce Maternity Tank - Women's
